about_the_game:
Cardchery is a collectible card game in which you don't need to read and learn hundreds of cards and rules. You just collect them!

EARN GOLD

Play the simple yet increasingly difficult 2D Archer Minigame to earn some gold.

[GIF OF MINIGAME]

OPEN PACKS

Spend your hard earned gold on different packs and open them to see what's inside.
[GIF OF PACK OPENING]

COLLECT CARDS

With 7 different rarities and over 200+ cards to collect, you better start playing now!
[GIF OF SEVERAL CARDS]

content_descriptors.notes: Some select cards may depict images that deal with mature topics or include text that may be considered as crude language.

name: Cardchery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: X64 archtiecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12- capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: Earn Gold by shooting increasingly harder targets in a 2D Archer Minigame. Spend your Gold in the Shop to buy Booster Packs and try to collect over 200+ cards which all improve the abilities of you archer!
